Class PokerGame

java.lang.Object
poker.model.game.PokerGame
public class PokerGame extends Object
Main game engine for 5-card draw poker. Manages game state, validates moves, and orchestrates game flow.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    PokerGame.Payout
    Represents a payout to a player.
